name: What's Hiding in Vanuatu? Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only the letters in VANUATU find a word that can be used for the hard-shelled fruit of some plants, and is also the name of the Ancient Egyptian Goddess of the sky.

Using only the letters in VANUATU come up with the first name for the American actress with the surname of Gardner who was nominated for an Academy Award for her portrayal in the movie "Mogambo" (1953).
Using only the letters in VANUATU find a popular fast-swimming food fish that come in varieties such as Albacore, Bluefin, and Bigeye.
Using only the letters in VANUATU find a word that means to boast or brag.
Using only the letters in VANUATU find the name of the 19th letter of the Greek alphabet.
Using only the letters in VANUATU find a name for an enclosed motor vehicle or the first name of the singer known for his 1967 rendition of the song "Brown Eyed Girl".
Using only the letters in VANUATU find the word for a large cask for beer or wine that is roughly equal to 252 wine gallons.
Using only the letters in VANUATU find a name for the two-toed sloth.
Using only the letters in VANUATU find a word for the darkening of the human skin in reaction to exposure to the sun.
Using only the letters in VANUATU find the name that you would call one of your parents female siblings.
